title: PUCSL approves power cuts for upcoming days
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission has approved power cuts from 6th to 12th June for all areas.
Accordingly, power cuts will last for 2 hours and 15 minutes from 6th to 10th June, while they will take place for 1 hour on 11th and 12th June.
Current crisis is an opportunity to transform economy: CBSL Governor
